definition: abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)
to receive/to accept/to enjoy/to bring into/to pay (tax etc)/nano- (one billionth)/to reinforce sole of shoes or stockings by close sewing

sentences.english: In Ghana today, one in two people has access to telecom services.
sentences.chinese: 今天在加纳，每2人中就有1人使用电信服务。

sentences.english: The second car was flying the Ghanaian pennant.
sentences.chinese: 第二辆车插着加纳的三角旗。

sentences.english: President John Kufuor is retiring after eight years in office.
sentences.chinese: 加纳总统库福尔在执政8年后将退休。

sentences.english: All went to Ganado High School.
Hence, people just follow this trunk road, move to the southern Ghana.
sentences.chinese: 因此，人们只是沿着这条主干道，移动到南加纳。

sentences.english: A colleague in Ghana had telex but no fax.
sentences.chinese: 在加纳共和国的同事有电传机，但没有传真机。

sentences.english: He will also visit the Vatican before leaving for Ghana.
sentences.chinese: 他还将访问梵蒂冈，随后将前往加纳访问。

sentences.english: The Ghanaians have a word for that.
sentences.chinese: 加纳人就专门有一个词来描述这种情况。

sentences.english: Asamoah Gyan scored Ghana's crucial second goal.
sentences.chinese: 加纳队的吉安踢进了关键的第二个进球。

sentences.english: Some have fled west to Liberia or east to Ghana.
sentences.chinese: 一些人逃到了西部的利比里亚或东部的加纳。

sentences.english: Later, Organa and the Wookiee attempted to escape from Xizor's palace.
sentences.chinese: 后来，奥加纳和这个伍基人试图逃离西佐的宫殿。

sentences.english: Tema is the port of Ghana in West Bfrica.
sentences.chinese: 特马，是西非加纳的港口。

sentences.english: In Ghana, for instance, the favourite dish is fufu – mashed cassava.
sentences.chinese: 比如在加纳，人们最喜欢的食物是木薯泥。

sentences.english: He recently met with West African health officials in the Ghanaian capital, Accra.
sentences.chinese: 最近他与西非健康官员在加纳首都阿克拉会面。

sentences.english: The Gambian rats were shipped to the United States from Ghana.
sentences.chinese: 冈比亚田鼠是从加纳船运到美国的。

sentences.english: Tema is the port of Ghana in West Africa.
sentences.chinese: 特马，是西非加纳的港口。

definition: Côte d'Ivoire or Ivory Coast in West Africa
